item.title: Santa likes some, others not
item.dc:creator: @MikeMike1997 MikeMike1997
item.description:
@MikeMike1997 wrote:

Okay this is an odd bug. Some people it will do the correct thing by the script others it will say nothing but I’ve also had it come up with “Cannot reach” or something like that… Here is the code

NPCHandler.java

				else if(npc.getId() == 8540 && player.getTask().getSanta() == 0) {
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Crimson Scape 2014 Christmas Present (It's been left in your bank)");;
				player.getBank().addItem(14595, 1, true);
				player.getBank().addItem(14602, 1, true);
				player.getBank().addItem(14603, 1, true);
				player.getBank().addItem(14605, 1, true);
				player.getTask().currentSantaAmount = 1;
				


				} else if(npc.getId() == 8540 && player.getTask().getSanta() == 1)
				player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("You have already recieved your present");

Read full topic
